import React, { useState, useContext, useRef } from 'react' import "./styles.css"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import menuContext from '../context/menuContext'; const Category = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const context = useContext(menuContext); const { deleteMenu } = context; const { menuData, getMenu, editMenu } = context; const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState(""); const categories = ["Chinese", "Italian", "Indian", "Beverages"]; const handleCategorySelect = (category) => { setSelectedCategory(category); setMenu({ ...menu, category }); } const handleLogout = () => { // Redirect to the login page if (localStorage.getItem('_id')) { getMenu() } else { navigate("/login"); } // eslint-disable-next-line } const ref = useRef(null) const refClose = useRef(null) const [menu, setMenu] = useState({ id: "", ename: "", ecategory: "", eprice: "", edescription: "", efile: "" }); const updateMenu = (currentMenu) => { ref.current.click(); setMenu({ id: currentMenu._id, ename: currentMenu.name, ecategory: currentMenu.category, eprice: currentMenu.price, edescription: currentMenu.description, efile: currentMenu.file }) } const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); editMenu(menu.id, menu.ename, menu.ecategory, menu.eprice, menu.edescription, menu.efile) refClose.current.click(); } const onChange = (e) => { setMenu({ ...menu, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
Chinese

    • ))}
{/* */}
); }; export default Category
